charges.charge_description: 18:1951 EXTORTION, RACKETEERING, &; THREATS (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is sentenced to custody of Bureau of Prisons for a term of 221 mos. Term consists of 41 mos on Ct 1 and 60 mos on each of Cts 2, 4 &; 6, to run consecutively; S/A fee of $50.00 per count, total $200.00 due immediately; (1)

charges.charge_description: TITLE 18 USC 924(c)(1) and 1951 KNOWINGLY USED AND CARRIED A FIREARM DURING THE COMMISSION OF A CRIME OF VIOLENCE, AFFECTING COMMERCE BY ROBBERY; UNLAWFULLY OBSTRUCT, DELAY AND AFFECT COMMERCE AND THE MOVEMENT OF ARTICLES AND COMMODITIES IN SUCH COMMERCE, BY ROBBERY IN THAT DEFENDANT DID UNLAWFULLY TAKE AND OBTAIN PERSONAL PROPERTY CONSISTING OF UNITED STATES CURRENCY BY MEANS OF ACTUAL OR THREATENED FORCE AND VIOLENCE AND FEAR OF INJURY TO THEIR PERSONS [5:92-m-305]
